Bali, Indonesia

Searching for temples and waterfalls in beautiful Bali

Bali, Indonesia

May 01, 2016 | By Emilio Kuzma-Floyd

Dont go chasing waterfalls.. or do. This is a photo essay of our journey through northern Bali, with description to come!

"Getting up at 3am to see the sunrise over this beautiful lake was more than worth it!"
